messages.message:
Hey, it took me ages to realise that to add a review queue I need to have everyone in the group in that workspace. If you don't have that, the option just isn't present in Deployment Configuration. Imo it would make a lot more sense to still display groups but grey them out and have a tool tip saying why they can't be added

cc @jack.robbins

@Hamish Can you explain more about what you mean here? I couldn't figure out exactly why review queues don't show up consistently. But the group is subordinate to the queue itself, so I'm not following your logic here?

I think this is the same issue we saw last week Melissa - the queues section only appears if you're building the deployment in a workspace with groups already. There's no indicator saying 'hey, you need to add a group to this workspace to use review queues'
I don't think that's the catch, because I've seen this screen. IME, it seems random that the queues sometimes don't appear. I wonder if this could be a bug.
definitely possible - @Hamish what org were you using?
Oh interesting - I like that idea @Hamish!! Much easier than explaining that the list you're seeing is only groups added to the workspace

@Jianqi Xing what do you think of this idea? Basically the selector for the group would show all the groups in the org, but the ones that aren't added to the workspace will be disabled and we can somehow indicate that it's because they're not added to the selected workspace. We can also always show a link to workspace settings to add groups in the helper text.

@jack.robbins the instance you saw where we don't show review queues at all was probably because you had your personal workspace selected. There cannot be groups in personal workspaces thus you cannot have review queues. Do you think we should render some message about that instead of not rendering review queues at all in that case?
I was thinking about that _and_ for commercial customers to upsell them on enterprise

I just tested visibility of review queues with all workspaces I have access to. They work as expected. I think the catch might be that you (obviously) can't configure review queues in your personal workspace, as Jessica said.

But also, if you have *All workspaces* selected and you click *Add deployment*, the new deployment defaults to *My workspace*, and doesn't show review queues.
I was seeing this in 'my workspace' - hence no groups there
We should already have an upsell action for commercial customers
